name: Hexters
description: "Do you know how computers work? No? We'll you're in luck, thanks to new technology we're going to find out! This is the future!" A city-building strategy / action game with some Tron / Darwinia inspired visuals and gameplay elements from classic series such as Settlers & Anno.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit or higher Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
